title: Eldritch Knight
content:
ciencies are Strength & Constitution and they have a Hit Dice of 1d10. They have proficiency with Simple weapons, Martial Weapons, Light Armour, Medium Armour, Heavy Armour, and Shields.

Eldritch Knights study magic to supplement their weaponry, allowing them to overcome resistance from the toughest foes.

BG3 Eldritch Knight Class Features

Eldritch Knight Spellcasting

Third Spellcasters: Gains spellcasting at level 3. Unlocks new spell level every 6 Fighter levels starting at level 3, up to
